column1: mexican_american_war_alternate_treaty_desc;With the Mexicans having refused the generous Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo
column2: some in our government have been pushing for a 'All of Mexico' option
column3: where the United States would annex the whole of Mexico. While annexing all of Mexico would certaintly be unrealistic
column4: we could lay claim to more of the bordering Mexican states.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: USA_organize_japan_desc;We should assert control over the islands and ensure our rule is secure
USA_create_japanese_dominion_desc;We've held onto the Japanese islands for some time now
column2: and both colonists and natives are starting to accept our rule. Perhaps it's time to grant them a place in their own government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: USJ_integrate_japanese_desc;The Japanese have been loyal to the Dominion's flag. They should have a more active role in the government of their islands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
USA_treaty_of_tokyojap_desc;We have defeated the forces of the emperor. The Japanese islands are now under our control. The natives will not be happy about this though...;;;;;;;;;;;;x
enable_usjap_minimod_desc;This minimod allows you to conquer Japan as the USA and set up a colony. Untested.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

USA_support_walker_desc;Recent news from Mexico: a man from Kentucky is attempting to set up a Sonoran Republic! Perhaps his cause is worth supporting... NOTE: You are not supposed to win the filibuster war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
enable_willwalk_minimod_desc;This minimod allows you to help filibuster William Walker achieve what he could never do in real life.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
USA_create_territory_nic_desc;Now that we control Nicaragua it's time to organize it into a territory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
USA_integrate_northern_territoriesmex_desc;We've held onto the territories of Sonora
column2: Chihuahua and Coahuila for quite some time now. It's time to officialy integrate them into the Union.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: USA_integrate_nicaragua_desc;Nicaragua has been an American territory for quite some time now and it has been mostly Americanized. It might be time to officialy integrate it into the Union.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: while not a threat to the United States
column3: could be further secured to serve American interests. It could be worth our while to organize a coup.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
